overview:
Phillip Rhodes is the Founder and President of Fogbeam Labs; a Chapel Hill, North Carolina based startup building an open source “Web 2.0” platform for enterprise knowledge management, knowledge discovery, and collaboration.

Phillip is a North Carolina native, originally hailing from Shallotte, NC in sunny Brunswick County, and currently resides in beautiful Chapel Hill where he hacks open source code, organizes the RTP Hackers & Founders Meetup, the Triangle Semantic Web Meetup and the TriJVM Hack Night Meetup.

Phillip has formerly worked for IBM, Red Hat, Ineo USA and Voice Data Solutions, among others.
